name: apply
description: This command allows users to apply for roles that they wish to obtain. They can do so by stating a reason why they wish to be approved.
example: apply Mod I can help to moderate the server

name: ban
description: This command bans the specified member from the server while sending them a message and logging the reason.

name: blacklist
description: This command bans the specified user from using the bot commands and logging the reason.

name: broadcast
description: This command will say the message from the bot account to all servers its a part of.

name: choices
description: This command will allow the bot to choose between choices provided to her.

name: clean
description: This command will delete all messages in pm chat sent by the bot.

name: coinflip
description: This command will ask the bot to flip a coin, then return the result.

name: donate
description: This command will send a link to members who wish to donate to the server.

name: giveaway
description: This command will take the reactions off a message and pick a random user.

name: help
description: This command will display a list of commands, then provide a command to see other information. (examples: usage, alias, description)

name: info
description: This command will display information about the server, or a specified user.

name: invite
description: This command will send links to member who would like to invite people, to ensure that all new members are sent to the #information page first.

name: kick
description: This command kicks members from the server while sending them a message and logging the reason.

name: letsplay
description: This command will allow members to communitcate with others in a easy way that they would like to play a game.

name: level
description: This command will allow users to find out what level a specified person is and the amount of points said person has earned.

name: move
description: This command will move members in a certain voice channel to another.

name: mute
description: This command will mute a user for a certain duration.

name: ping
description: This command will test if the bot in online and the time it takes to respond.

name: points
description: This command will allow users to find out how many points a specified person has.

name: prisolis
description: This command creates a channel used for “Storytime with Mr.Z”, aka Zeadron, as he develops his new book.

name: prune
description: This command will purge the server of any user that have inactive for more than 30 days and sends them a pm inviting them to come back when they become more active.

name: purge
description: This command removes a specified number of messages from the channel. Flags or filters can be added to further specify the messages, such filters would remove messages of a specific content or from a specific author.

name: restart
description: This command will allow admins to restart the bot or the server.

name: reverse
description: This command allows will ask the bot to reverse the word or sentence given to it.

name: rolldice
description: This command will ask the bot to roll a die or dice and return the result.

name: roulette
description: Play russian roulette with a set amount of points

name: rps
description: This command will play rock paper scissors with the bot.

name: say
description: This command will say the message from the bot account, therefore making the message anonymous.

name: set
description: This command allows admins or owners to set key functionailty of the bot such as prefix, welcome/goodbye messages and game of the bot.
example: set welcome Hey $mention welcome to ther server!
set goodbye Were sad to see you go but if you would like to come back $link

name: shutdown
description: This command will allow admins to shutdown the bot or the server.

name: softban
description: This command kicks a member from the server, deleting all messages in chat from that user, sends them a message and logs the reason.

name: status
description: This command will display the current status of the bot.

name: tabletop
description: This command creates a text channel used for events.

name: top
description: This command will display the top ranked users of the server, along with their level and points.

name: warn
description: This command sends a warning message to specified member of the server. It also logs the message sent.

name: whitelist
description: This command keep a specified user from being limited by the bot or users.
